projects.name: E-Commerce Site
projects.description: Managed end-to-end operations of an e-commerce platform, ensuring seamless functionality and a positive user experience. Utilized a combination of technical expertise and strategic thinking to drive online sales and enhance customer satisfaction. User Experience Enhancement: Led the redesign of the website's interface, incorporating responsive design principles and improving navigation, leading to a 25% reduction in bounce rates. Offering cost-effective solutions for diverse industries.

projects.name: SMS Spam Classifier
projects.description: Developed a machine learning model for SMS spam detection using Python and scikit-learn, achieving an accuracy of over 95% on a labeled dataset. Engineered a real-time SMS filtering system utilizing natural language processing techniques and regular expressions to classify incoming messages as spam or legitimate, reducing spam exposure by 80% allowing seamless integration with existing communication platforms and providing robust spam filtering capabilities to users.

experiences.description: Developed responsive e-commerce website with React.js. Implemented Node.js, optimized SEO/performance. Improved project efficiency by 20%, resolved API issues, and created documentation. Utilized HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Git.
